item.title: ffmpeg自动安装脚本
item.description: ffmpeg自动安装脚本，执行即 #!/bin/bash VER=curl https://johnvansickle.com/ffmpeg/ | grep 'release:' |awk '{print $2}' curl -O https://johnvansickle.com/ffmpeg/releases/ffmpeg-release-64bit-static.tar.xz tar -xvjf ffmpeg-release-64bit-static.tar.xz cp ./ffmpeg-${VER}-64bit-static/ffmpeg-10bit /usr/bin/ cp ./ffmpeg-${VER}-64bit-static/ffserver /usr/bin/ cp ./ffmpeg-${VER}-64bit-static/qt-faststart /usr/bin/ cp ./ffmpeg-${VER}-64bit-static/ffmpeg /usr/bin/ cp ./ffmpeg-${VER}-64bit-static/ffprobe /usr/bin/ rm -rf ffmpeg-${VER}-64bit-static rm -rf ffmpeg-release-64bit-static.tar.xz
